remarks: Heine-Borel theorem for Euclidean space.  A subset of Euclidean space is compact iff it is closed and bounded.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)

rrnheibor.4 $e |- U = ( MetOpen ` ( Rn ` I ) ) $.
rrnheibor $p |- ( ( I e. Fin /\ Y C_ X ) -> ( T e. Comp <-> ( Y e. ( Clsd ` U ) /\ M e. ( Bnd ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
